name: Ascending to Valhalla
description:
Disclaimer

Project developed for university Game Jam in 24 hours.  

Story

You are a Viking who fell in a battle. Now your soul has to ascend to Valhalla, but on your way there you will encounter different obstacles...

But if you manage to get there, you will be able to celebrate eternity with the gods and bravest of the warriors!

Made by:

Programming - Ricard Ruiz and Veronika Bolshakova

Art & Design - Blanca Velasco, Daniel Sánchez y Jordi Borraz
